page.title: 17GOVERNMENT OF THE AREA
page.content: THE FOUR TIERS OF GOVERNMENT FOR THIS AREA ARE AS FOLLOWS. EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT: THE HON. SIR PETER VANNECK. PARLIAMENT; RICHARD HOLT, BOTH CONSERVATIVE PARTY MEMBERS. CLEVELAND COUNTY COUNCIL: MR. D. C. MCREDDIE, OF SKELTON-IN-CLEVELAND. AND MR. N. LOUGHRAN FOR LANGBAUGH DISTRICT COUNCIL AND LOCKWOOD PARISH COUNCIL, BOTH LABOUR PARTY MEMBERS. MR. LOUGHRAN IS YOUNG AND VERY DEDICATED. THE PARISH COUNCIL IS ACTIVE IN USING ITS FUNDS TO MAKE THE ENVIRONMENT PLEASANT FOR THE RESIDENTS. THEY EMPLOY A PART-TIME CLERK TO DEAL WITH THE LOCAL ADMINISTRATION AND USE THE MANPOWER SERVICES, THE COUNTY COUNCIL SCHEME, THE HERITAGE COASTAL PATH TEAM AND THE EAST CLEVELAND EMPLOYMENT AGENCY TO CARRY OUT TASKS OF IMPROVEMENT TO COMMUNCAL BUILDINGS, PATHWAYS AND OPEN SPACES.
